summary: Custom Preset -> Substantial change of atmosphere with much improved colors and lightning. Check the pictures out for a better idea!
descriptionHtml:
Before installing my custom preset you will need to follow the steps below:

Download > ENBSeries by Boris Vorontsov > 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2971 (don’t forget to Endorse)

>Extract 
	d3d9.dll

To [Skyrim root folder]

Download > Darker Nights by Laicus > 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=648 (don’t forget to Endorse)

>Extract
	DarkerNights.esm
	NoTint.esm

To [Data folder] inside [Skyrim root folder]

Download > Darker Interiors by Laicus > 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=648 (don’t forget to Endorse)

>Extract
	DarkerInteriors.esm
	DarkerInteriorsAdd.esm
	Strings

To [Data folder] inside [Skyrim root folder]

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Now, after having installed all the necessary mods what you need to do is:

Open > LivSkyrim.zip
>Extract
	enbeffect.fx
	enbseries.ini

To [Skyrim root folder]

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
While not fundamental these mods should be installed for optimal results:

Alternate HQ Water Texture Mod by Kman420 > 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1095 (don’t forget to Endorse)


No More Blocky Faces by Xenius > 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=30 (don’t forget to Endorse)
author: flp213
